translated: Lorenzo Sciarpelloni says Lorenzo di Credi, born around 1459 in Florence and died January 12, 1537 in the same city, was an Italian painter and sculptor of the Renaissance.
original: Lorenzo Sciarpelloni, dit Lorenzo di Credi, né vers 1459 à Florence et mort le 12 janvier 1537 dans la même ville, est un peintre et sculpteur italien de la Renaissance.
